statements: SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name, availability FROM equipment_inventory;
SELECT * FROM equipment_inventory WHERE availability = TRUE;
SELECT equipment_name, maintenance_history FROM equipment_inventory ORDER BY equipment_name DESC;
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name FROM equipment_inventory WHERE maintenance_history LIKE '%repair%';
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name, usage_statistics FROM equipment_inventory LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM equipment_inventory WHERE equipment_id = 1;
SELECT equipment_name, availability FROM equipment_inventory WHERE availability = TRUE;
SELECT equipment_name, maintenance_history FROM equipment_inventory WHERE LENGTH(maintenance_history) > 0;
SELECT equipment_name, usage_statistics FROM equipment_inventory WHERE JSON_EXTRACT(usage_statistics, '$.usage_count') > 50;
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name FROM equipment_inventory ORDER BY equipment_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM equipment_inventory;
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name FROM equipment_inventory WHERE availability = TRUE;
SELECT equipment_id, maintenance_history FROM equipment_inventory ORDER BY equipment_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM ecotourism_activities WHERE location = 'Forest' ORDER BY start_date ASC;
SELECT activity_id, activity_name, max_participants FROM ecotourism_activities WHERE max_participants > 10;
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name FROM equipment_inventory WHERE availability = true;
SELECT * FROM equipment_inventory WHERE maintenance_history LIKE '%urgent%';
SELECT activity_name, location, start_date FROM ecotourism_activities WHERE max_participants >= 10 ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM equipment_inventory WHERE usage_statistics->>'average_usage_hours' > '50';
SELECT equipment_name, CASE WHEN availability THEN 'Available' ELSE 'Not Available' END AS availability_status FROM equipment_inventory;
SELECT * FROM Equipment;
SELECT equipment_name, availability FROM Equipment WHERE availability = TRUE;
SELECT equipment_name, maintenance_history FROM Equipment ORDER BY equipment_name DESC;
SELECT equipment_name, usage_statistics FROM Equipment WHERE equipment_id = 2;
SELECT equipment_id, COUNT(*) FROM EquipmentAvailability GROUP BY equipment_id;
SELECT equipment_name, availability FROM Equipment WHERE equipment_id = 1
SELECT equipment_name, availability, maintenance_history FROM Equipment ORDER BY equipment_name ASC
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name FROM EquipmentAvailability JOIN Equipment ON EquipmentAvailability.equipment_id = Equipment.equipment_id WHERE available = TRUE ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT equipment_name, maintenance_date FROM EquipmentMaintenance JOIN Equipment ON EquipmentMaintenance.equipment_id = Equipment.equipment_id WHERE equipment_name LIKE '%lo%'
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_maintenance FROM EquipmentMaintenance
SELECT id, name, type, quantity, available FROM equipment;
SELECT * FROM maintenance WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT equipment_id, user_id, start_time, end_time FROM usage ORDER BY start_time DESC;
SELECT id, equipment_id, usage_count, last_usage_time FROM statistics WHERE usage_count > 5;
SELECT id, name, type FROM equipment WHERE available = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM equipment WHERE type = 'computer';
SELECT id, name, quantity FROM equipment WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY name ASC;

SELECT equipment.name, usage.start_time, usage.end_time FROM equipment INNER JOIN usage ON equipment.id = usage.equipment_id WHERE equipment.type = 'printer' AND usage.user_id = 123 ORDER BY usage.start_time DESC;

SELECT equipment.name, maintenance.start_date, maintenance.end_date, maintenance.description FROM equipment LEFT JOIN maintenance ON equipment.id = maintenance.equipment_id WHERE maintenance.end_date IS NULL;

SELECT equipment.name, statistics.usage_count, statistics.last_usage_time FROM equipment INNER JOIN statistics ON equipment.id = statistics.equipment_id WHERE statistics.usage_count > 50 ORDER BY statistics.last_usage_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM equipment;
SELECT equipment_name, equipment_type FROM equipment WHERE availability = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM maintenance ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name FROM equipment WHERE equipment_type = 'Tools';
SELECT user_name, user_role FROM users ORDER BY user_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM equipment;
SELECT equipment_name, equipment_type FROM equipment WHERE availability = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM maintenance ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT inventory_id, equipment_name, quantity FROM inventory JOIN equipment ON inventory.equipment_id = equipment.equipment_id;
SELECT user_name, user_email, user_role FROM users WHERE user_role = 'Admin';
